text: Lefats’eng ho teng masaba-saba a bapileng, le masimo a merara le ona masimo a jetsoeng lipalema tsa mefuta e sa ts’oaneng, masimo a noesetsoang ka metsi a le mang. Re entse hore litholoana tse ling tsa tsona li latsoehe ha monate ho feta tse ling. Bonang! Ruri kahar’a lintho tsena ke Lits’upiso ho batho banang le utloisisang
